commits.message:
EUCA-11471 Unexport volume failures

Description:
 It is possible that the 'volumeGroup' field hasn't been properly initialized before constructing the path to check for the existence of the volume.
 This led to a path that was improperly constructed: "/dev/null/euca-vol-12341234"

Changes:
 To avoid the 'null' string value, removed code to construct the path and used LVMVolumeInfo::getAbsoluteLVPath() to get the path as constructed from the database.

Testing:
 General usage testing of attach/detach of volumes and verify that path is valid. Unable to reproduce exact error condition.
